course.subject: MGMT
course.name: Knowing and Managing Your Social Networks for Careers and Business
course.description: Business environments change, but what stays constant is that business still involves people and relationships. Knowing the right people and building a helpful network of people are critical to successful careers. Throughout this course, you  will learn about: 1)  why are networks important, and how, 2) what are the different  aspects of networks that matter, and 3) how does your network look like? To answer these questions, this course will introduce you to elementary theories of social networks and skills in network science.
